item.description: Here we need to create a Booking then verify that booking, then partially update the newly created booking, then again verify the booking with partial updated details, then we perform fully update, then again verify the booking with updated details and atlast we will delete the booking and then verify the booking is present in the booking id list or not.
Here we test the entire end to end intraction between the APIs.
